participant_1.background:
I am proud of my family's history and culture.
i am a special ed teacher.
I love to start my day with some quiet time to myself.
i don t trust anyone.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons.
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well.
my favorite hobby is reading suspense novels.
I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it.

content.text: Good, thanks! How are you today?
I'm doing well! I'm a special ed teacher, and I love my job.
That's awesome! I like to read suspense novels, and I watch a lot of cartoons.
I love reading too! I usually read a book a week. What's your favorite book?
I don't really have a favorite book, but I like reading suspense novels.
Me too! I've been reading a lot of Stephen King lately.
I've heard good things about Stephen King! I've been meaning to read some of his books.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
What do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks, and I read a lot. I also like to spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go for walks too, but I can't see very well, so I usually have to bring someone with me.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm glad you still enjoy going for walks, though.
Yeah, I do! It's a great way to relax and get some exercise.
I agree! I'm glad you found something you enjoy doing.
